[[User AlphAshish]] and [[User:Call Me Anshu]], It is recommended to avoid including less notable medal tournaments in the infobox as it can unnecessarily lengthen it. Additionally, when it comes to the lead paragraph, statistics such as most runs in [[T20I]] and [[IPL]] hold higher reputation compared to being second in most centuries. If there are any concerns regarding this matter, it would be preferable to initiate a discussion on the talk page.

page: List of international cricket centuries by Virat Kohli
message: The statement has been updated to accurately reflect the date on which Kohli scored his century, rather than simply the start date of the match. This change better highlights the significance of when the century was actually scored, which is more relevant than the start date of the match.  Furthermore, the proposal to merge Kohli's successive centuries with a particular opponent is a valid suggestion as it provides readers with an understanding of the number of centuries scored in a series.

page: List of international cricket centuries by Virat Kohli
message: The information as per source has been corrected to ensure its accuracy, although it raises concerns about how many other dates may also contain errors, necessitating further cross-checking. Regarding the suggestion to merge Kohli's successive centuries, it is unclear how such a merger could lead to confusion or complexity. Further clarification may be needed to understand the issue more fully, else I may merge again.

page: List of international cricket centuries by Virat Kohli

message: /* 2023–present */ The statement has been refined to adhere to proper English standards, with the removal of any superfluous information. Additionally, a reliable source, [[The Guardian]], has been incorporated to enhance the credibility of the information provided.

page: List of international cricket centuries by Virat Kohli
message: I have combined the name of the opposing team in instances where multiple centuries were scored successively, as this provides a clearer understanding that the player achieved this feat across the entire series (in most cases).
I have revised and refined the information regarding Kohli's /*India Under-19*/ cricket career, with the aim of improving the overall quality of the content.

/* Delhi */ This additional information sheds light on Kohli's domestic cricket achievements, which are often overlooked in favor of his /*International career*/. Further details regarding his performances in the latter shall be added in due course.

the content is mentioned in the further citations.

To maintain the recommended structure for a lead section, the first and second paragraphs have been combined. However, the resulting paragraph has been made shorter to avoid excessive length. [2] Restored some information
/* Player profile */ I have addressed the issue of the content's tone, which exhibited an overly analogical approach.
/* Outside cricket */ Omitting excessively laudatory expressions

/* In popular culture */ With the intention of promoting neutrality in the section, appropriate revisions were made to the content. Nevertheless, as the section is specifically dedicated to the representation of the athlete in various forms of media, it is justifiable to furnish information that is well-known. It is hoped that these adjustments are satisfactory to the individual who raised the concern.

/* Retirement from captaincy across formats */ (1) Rephrased (2) The remarks made by [[Chetan Sharma]] are currently receiving a disproportionate amount of attention, as they pertain to a previous contentious episode involving Kohli's removal from the captaincy and the rumored discord with Ganguly.
